ja483:9.4: maccamupabbajanti → maccumupabbajanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | maccumupapajjanti (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja483:19.4: hañño mama pāṇado yo → hañño yo mamapāṇadassa (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | haññe mama pāṇadassa (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja483:21.2: Rajjaṃ imaṃ dhammaguṇe → rajjampimaṃ cassa gaṇe (mr)
ja483:22.2: yācayogo bhavitvā → pāhunake karitvā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yācayogo viditvā (mr)
